CVE-2014-0001.title: MySQL main() buffer overflow
CVE-2014-0001.body: MySQL is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the MySQL client in the main() function. By persuading a victim to connect to a malicious server, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Oracle Critical Patch Update Advisory - January 2014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-0032.title: Apache Subversion mod_dav_svn module denial of service
CVE-2014-0032.body: Apache Subversion is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of specific requests by the mod_dav_svn module when the SVNListParentPath option is enabled. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Apache SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-0072.title: Apache Cordova File-Transfer iOS plugin weak security
CVE-2014-0072.body: Apache Cordova File-Transfer iOS standalone iOS plugin for iOS and the plugin from Cordova could provide weaker than expected security, caused by the use of insecure default settings. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to launch further attacks against the system.Upgrade to the latest version of Cordova File-Transfer iOS plugin (0.4.2 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-0073.title: Apache Cordova In-App-Browser privilege escalation
CVE-2014-0073.body: Apache Cordova In-App-Browser standalone iOS plugin for iOS and the plugin from Cordova could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper validation of input. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of InAppBrowser plugin (0.3.0 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-0107.title: Apache Xalan-Java output properties security bypass
CVE-2014-0107.body: Apache Xalan-Java could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of output properties. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the secure processing feature to load arbitrary restricted classes.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Apache SVN Repository. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-0173.title: Jetpack plugin for WordPress security bypass
CVE-2014-0173.body: Jetpack plugin for WordPress could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly verify authorization when accessing XML-RPC service. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions.Upgrade to the latest version of Jetpack plugin for WordPress (2.9.3 or later), available from the WordPress Plugin Directory. See References.

CVE-2014-0254.title: Microsoft Windows IPv6 denial of service
CVE-2014-0254.body: Microsoft Windows is vulnerable to denial of service, caused by the incomplete validation of TCP/IP network packets. By sending a large number of specially crafted IPv6 router advertisement packets, an attacker on the same subnet could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service on any affected systems within the subnet network.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-006. See References.

CVE-2014-0267.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer memory corruption code execution
CVE-2014-0267.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-0268.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the failure to properly validate permissions. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. CVE-2014-0293.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer cross-domain policies information disclosure
CVE-2014-0293.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to bypass cross-domain security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly enforce cross-domain policies. By persuading a victim to visit a malicious Web page using Internet Explorer, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass cross-domain security restrictions and obtain sensitive information from another security zone or domain in Internet Explorer.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-0330.title: Dell KACE K1000 System Management Appliance cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-0330.body: Dell KACE K1000 System Management Appliance is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the adminui/user_list.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the LABEL_ID parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-0351.title: Fortinet FortiOS FortiManager Service man-in-the-middle
CVE-2014-0351.body: Fortinet FortiOS could allow a remote attacker to conduct a man-in-the-middle attack, caused by the failure to prevent use of anonymous cipher suite by the FortiManager protocol service. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to interfere with communications and launch further attacks against a vulnerable target.Refer to Fortinet Security Advisory:/FG-IR-14-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0397.title: libXtsol multiple buffer overflows
CVE-2014-0397.body: libXtsol is vulnerable to multiple buffer overflows, caused by improper bounds checking. By sending an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-0479.title: Debian reportbug version number code execution
CVE-2014-0479.body: Debian reportbug could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to inject shell metacharacters into the version number and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Launchpad Bug #1353046 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0486.title: Knot DNS DNS messages denial of service
CVE-2014-0486.body: Knot DNS is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a specially-crafted DNS message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Upgrade to the latest version of Knot DNS (1.5.3-1 or later), available from the Knot DNS Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-0494.title: Adobe Digital Editions unspecified code execution
CVE-2014-0494.body: Adobe Digital Editions could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to APSB14-03 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0501.title: Adobe Shockwave Player code execution
CVE-2014-0501.body: Adobe Shockwave Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB14-06 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0547.body: Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, and Adobe Air could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim or cause the application to crash.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-0548.body: An unspecified error in Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, and Adobe Air could allow a remote attacker to bypass the same origin policy and launch further attacks on the system.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-0556.title: Adobe Flash Player and Adobe Air buffer copyPixelsToByteArray overflow
CVE-2014-0556.body: Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, and Adobe Air are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow caused by an integer overflow in the copyPixelsToByteArray method. By persuading a victim to visit a Web page containing a malicious flash file, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the victim's system.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-0557.body: An unspecified error in Adobe Flash Player, as bundled in multiple products, and Adobe Air could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions and launch further attacks on the system.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-21 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-0560.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader code execution
CVE-2014-0560.body: An unspecified use-after-free vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system using unknown attack vectors.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0563.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader code execution
CVE-2014-0563.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0566.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader code execution
CVE-2014-0566.body: An unspecified vulnerability in Adobe Reader and Acrobat could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-20 or APSB15-15 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0567.title: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader buffer overflow
CVE-2014-0567.body: Adobe Acrobat and Adobe Reader are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Adobe Security Bulletin APSB14-20 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0660.title: Cisco TelePresence ISDN Gateway D-channel denial of service
CVE-2014-0660.body: Cisco TelePresence ISDN Gateway is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of the ISDN Q.931 signaling protocol. By injecting specially-crafted packets in the Q.931 flow, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to trigger a drop of the data channel (D-channel) and cause all calls to be terminate.Refer to cisco-sa-20140122-isdngw for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0661.title: Cisco TelePresence System Status Collection Daemon command execution
CVE-2014-0661.body: Cisco TelePresence could allow a remote attacker from within the local network to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by an error in the System Status Collection Daemon (SSCD) code. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system with root privileges.Refer to cisco-sa-20140122-cts for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0662.title: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server SIP denial of service
CVE-2014-0662.body: Cisco TelePresence Video Communication Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of messages by the Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) module. By sending a specially-crafted Session Description Protocol (SDP) message to UDP and TCP port 5060, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140122-vcs for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0664.title: Cisco Unity Connection IMAP denial of service
CVE-2014-0664.body: Cisco Unity Connection is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Internet Message Access Protocol (IMAP) function. By issuing specific IMAP commands, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume 100% CPU resources.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0665.title: Cisco Identity Services Engine unauthorized access
CVE-2014-0665.body: Cisco Identity Services Engine (ISE) could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain access to the system, caused by the failure to check the user privileges correctly when downloading the support bundle by the role-based access control code. By downloading the support bundle without the appropriate privileges, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to sensitive information such as the user database.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0666.title: Cisco Jabber for Window Send Screen Capture code execution
CVE-2014-0666.body: Cisco Jabber for Windows could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by insufficient validation of data in the packets sent by the Send Screen Capture function. By crafting or altering the packets sent as part of a send screen capture, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the Windows machine.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0667.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System RMI information disclosure
CVE-2014-0667.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insufficient authorization enforcement in the RMI interface. By accessing the ACS via the RMI interface, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read arbitrary files located on the server.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0668.title: Cisco Secure Access Control System parameter cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-0668.body: Cisco Secure Access Control System (ACS) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0669.title: Cisco ASR 5000 Series Gateway GPRS Support Node security bypass
CVE-2014-0669.body: Cisco ASR 5000 Series Gateway GPRS Support Node (GGSN) could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the incorrect processing of specific WSP packets by the Wireless Session Protocol (WSP) function. By sending a specially-crafted WSP packet, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to browse free of charge instead of being redirected to a Top-Up portal.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0670.title: Cisco MediaSense Search and Play interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-0670.body: Cisco MediaSense is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Search and Play interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Current customers should contact the vendor for update information. See References.

CVE-2014-0671.title: Cisco MediaSense URL open redirection
CVE-2014-0671.body: Cisco MediaSense could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specific URL parameter to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Current customers should contact the vendor for update information. See References.

CVE-2014-0672.title: Cisco MediaSense Search and Play interface information disclosure
CVE-2014-0672.body: Cisco MediaSense could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insufficient authorization controls in the Search and Play interface. By accessing the Search and Play interface, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access recordings.Current customers should contact the vendor for update information. See References.

CVE-2014-0673.title: Cisco Video Surveillance 5000 Series HD IP Dome Cameras interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-0673.body: Cisco Video Surveillance 5000 Series HD IP Dome Cameras is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Web interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Current customers should contact the vendor for update information. See References.

CVE-2014-0674.title: Cisco Video Surveillance Operations Manager MySQL unauthorized access
CVE-2014-0674.body: Cisco Video Surveillance Operations Manager (VSOM) could allow a remote attacker to gain unauthorized access to the system, caused by insufficient authentication controls within the configuration of the MySQL database. By connecting to the database on a vulnerable VSOM without providing a password, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the MySQL database.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0676.title: Cisco NX-OS TACACS privilege escalation
CVE-2014-0676.body: Cisco NX-OS could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error when processing specific commands in the TACACS+ command authorization code. By executing multiple commands in a sequence, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute certain commands without being authorized by the TACACS+ server.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0677.title: Cisco NX-OS Label Distribution Protocol denial of service
CVE-2014-0677.body: Cisco NX-OS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious Label Distribution Protocol (LDP) messages. By sending a specially-crafted LDP Hello message, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to stop accepting valid LDP sessions during a 60-second period.Current customers should contact the vendor for update information. See References.

CVE-2014-0678.title: Cisco Secure ACS portal interface unauthorized access
CVE-2014-0678.body: Cisco Secure ACS could allow an authenticated remote attacker to gain unauthorized access, caused by insufficient session management in the portal. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to access the portal with the privileges of another user.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-0686.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager permissions privilege escalation

CVE-2014-0908.body: The User Attribute feature in IBM Business Process Manager does not have an authorization concept. However, there are security-sensitive use cases for user attribute values, such as email notifications or task assignments that use expressions. You might also choose to store confidential information about users in user attribute values. The lack of authorization for this feature can create a security exposure.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. CVE-2014-1454.body: Pearson eSIS is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input related to the body of enterprise messages. CVE-2014-1457.body: Open Web Analytics (OWA) is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by an error in the CSRF prevention mechanism that results in weak nonce values. By predicting a nonce value and persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could perform actions on behalf of the victim. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of OWA (1.5.6 or later), available from the Open Web Analytics Web Site Web site. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3037.title: IBM Rational Engineering Lifecycle Manager, Rational Software Architect Design Manager and Rational Rhapsody Design Manager cross-site request forgery
CVE-2014-3037.body: Rational Engineering Lifecycle Manager, Rational Software Architect Design Manager, and Rhapsody Design Manager use the component IBM Configuration Management Application (VVC), which is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied data. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3038.title: IBM SPSS Modeler gain access
CVE-2014-3038.body: IBM SPSS Modeler running on Unix platforms contains a vulnerability that could allow a local attacker to gain access to files that normally would only be available to privileged users. The server authenticates a user and spawns a new process that runs in the context of the authenticated user (setuid). But the process retains the root GID (0) and associated privileged groups so the user has access to certain system files that would normally be denied.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

A successful exploit could completely compromise confidentiality and accessibility of the system, and partially impact the integrity of the system.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-3074.title: IBM AIX MALLOC privilege escalation
CVE-2014-3074.body: It has been identified that the runtime linker allows privilege escalation via arbitrary file writes with elevated privileges programs. When MALLOCOPTIONS and MALLOCBUCKETS environment variables are set with bucket statistics options and by executing certain setuid programs, a non-privileged user may able to create a root owned file with 666 permission.Refer to IBM SECURITY ADVISORY for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-3340.title: Cisco Webex MeetMeNow Server directory traversal
CVE-2014-3340.body: Cisco Webex MeetMeNow Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to a PHP file containing directory traversal sequences to view arbitrary files on the system.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3341.title: Cisco NX-OS information disclosure
CVE-2014-3341.body: Cisco NX-OS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to respond to an invalid SNMP request in a consistent manner. By sending an overly large number of SNMP requests, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to enumerate VLANs that are configured on the affected device.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3343.title: Cisco IOS XR DHCPv6 denial of service
CVE-2014-3343.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious DHCPv6 packets. By sending a specially-crafted DHCPv6 packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to crash.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3344.title: Cisco Transport Gateway for Smart Call Home webframework cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3344.body: Cisco Transport Gateway for Smart Call Home (TG-SCH) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the web framework. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3346.title: Cisco Transport Gateway for Smart Call Home web framework denial of service
CVE-2014-3346.body: Cisco Transport Gateway for Smart Call Home (TG-SCH) is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the web framework. By sending a specially-crafted string to the web server, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to crash.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3348.title: Cisco Unified Computing System E-Series Blade servers denial of service
CVE-2014-3348.body: Cisco Unified Computing System E-Series Blade servers are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of malicious packets by the Cisco Integrated Management Controller (Cisco IMC) SSH module. By sending a specially-crafted packet, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to become unresponsive.Refer to cisco-sa-20140908-ucse for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3349.title: Cisco Intelligent Automation for Cloud file upload
CVE-2014-3349.body: Cisco Intelligent Automation for Cloud could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of a file type. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3350.title: Cisco Intelligent Automation for Cloud open redirect
CVE-2014-3350.body: Cisco Intelligent Automation for Cloud could allow a remote authenticated attacker to conduct phishing attacks, caused by an open redirect vulnerability in the URL. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unknown parameter in a specially-crafted URL to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3353.title: Cisco IOS XR IPv6 denial of service
CVE-2014-3353.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious IPv6 packets by the ICMPv6 client library. By sending a specially-crafted IPv6 packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to be dropped.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3354.title: Cisco IOS and Cisco IOS XE RSVP protocol denial of service
CVE-2014-3354.body: Cisco IOS and Cisco IOS XE are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the RSVP protocol. By sending specially-crafted IPv4 or IPv6 RSVP packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-rsvp for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3357.title: Cisco IOS mDNS denial of service
CVE-2014-3357.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the multicast DNS (mDNS) gateway function. By sending specially-crafted IPv4 or IPv6 packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-mdns for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3358.title: Cisco IOS mDNS denial of service
CVE-2014-3358.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the multicast Domain Name System (mDNS) implementation. By sending specially-crafted mDNS packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-mdns for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3359.title: Cisco IOS DHCPv6 Server feature denial of service
CVE-2014-3359.body: Cisco IOS and Cisco IOS XE are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the DHCPv6 Server feature. By sending specially-crafted DHCPv6 packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-dhcpv6 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3360.title: Cisco IOS and Cisco IOS XE SIP denial of service
CVE-2014-3360.body: Cisco IOS and Cisco IOS XE are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the SIP implementation. By sending a specially-crafted SIP message, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-sip for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3361.title: Cisco IOS NAT denial of service
CVE-2014-3361.body: Cisco IOS is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error within the application-layer gateway (ALG) module. By sending specially-crafted SIP messages that require network address translation (NAT), a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to cisco-sa-20140924-nat for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3362.title: Cisco TelePresence System MXP Series Software denial of service
CVE-2014-3362.body: Cisco TelePresence System MXP Series Software is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a memory leak when management flows are created. By creating several management session requests, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to become unresponsive to management session requests.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3363.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager web framework code cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3363.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the web framework code. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability using an unspecified parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3366.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager SQL injection
CVE-2014-3366.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote authenticated attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3367.title: Cisco Nexus 1000V cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3367.body: Cisco Nexus 1000V is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3372.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CCM reports cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3372.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CCM reports interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTTP GET or POST methods to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3373.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager DNA cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3373.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CCM Dialed Number Analyzer interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTTP GET or POST methods to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3374.title: Cisco Unified Communications Manager CCM admin cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3374.body: Cisco Unified Communications Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the CCM admin interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using HTTP GET or POST methods to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3376.title: Cisco IOS XR RSVP denial of service
CVE-2014-3376.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious RSVP packets. By sending a specially-crafted RSVP packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3377.title: Cisco IOS XR SNMPv2 denial of service
CVE-2014-3377.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious SNMPv2 packets. By sending a specially-crafted SNMPv2 packet, a remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3378.title: Cisco IOS XR TACACS+ denial of service
CVE-2014-3378.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious TACACS+ packets. By sending a specially-crafted TACACS+ packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3379.title: Cisco IOS XR MPLS denial of service
CVE-2014-3379.body: Cisco IOS XR is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper processing of malicious MPLS packets. By sending a specially-crafted MPLS packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3380.title: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager denial of service
CVE-2014-3380.body: Cisco Unified Communications Domain Manager is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the improper handling of TCP packets. By sending a specially-crafted TCP packet, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume an overly large amount of CPU resources.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3409.title: Cisco IOS and IOS XE CFM denial of service
CVE-2014-3409.body: Cisco IOS and IOS XE are vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error in the Ethernet Connectivity Fault Management (CFM) when parsing malicious packets. By sending specially-crafted CFM packets, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to cause the device to reload.Refer to Cisco Security Notice for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3429.title: IPython's Notebook server code execution
CVE-2014-3429.body: IPython's Notebook server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to verify the origin of websocket requests. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the ipython GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3434.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection ADC privilege escalation
CVE-2014-3434.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the improper validation of input by the sysplant driver, within the Application and Device Control (ADC) component on a SEP client. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a BSOD and gain SYSTEM-level privileges.Refer to SYM14-013 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3438.title: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3438.body: Symantec Endpoint Protection Manager is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Symantec Security Advisory SYM14-015 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3442.title: Winamp .flv code execution
CVE-2014-3442.body: Winamp could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error when handling malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted .flv file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-3446.title: BSS Continuity CMS getnode.aspx SQL injection
CVE-2014-3446.body: BSS Continuity CMS is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the getnode.aspx script using the nodeid parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-3464.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform security bypass
CVE-2014-3464.body: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an incomplete fix related to the failure to properly enforce the method level restrictions for JAX-WS Service endpoints by the EJB invocation handler implementation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and invoke a JAX-WS handler.Apply the appropriate update for this vulnerability. See References.

CVE-2014-3472.title: Red Hat JBoss AS SimpleSecurityManager security bypass
CVE-2014-3472.body: Red Hat JBoss AS could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to check caller roles by the isCallerInRole() method of the SimpleSecurityManager. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to circumvent the caller check in applications and gain access to the system.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3481.title: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (JEAP) XML External Entity (XXE) information disclosure
CVE-2014-3481.body: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Application Platform could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the enablement of entity expansion by org.jboss.as.jaxrs.deployment.JaxrsIntegrationProcessor. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using unknown attack vectors to read arbitrary files.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3506.title: OpenSSL DTLS denial of service
CVE-2014-3506.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when processing DTLS handshake messages. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to consume an overly large amount of memory.Refer to OpenSSL Security Advisory [6 Aug 2014] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3507.title: OpenSSL DTLS denial of service
CVE-2014-3507.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending specially-crafted DTLS packets, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to leak memory and cause a denial of service.Refer to OpenSSL Security Advisory [6 Aug 2014] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3508.title: OpenSSL OBJ_obj2txt information disclosure
CVE-2014-3508.body: OpenSSL could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in OBJ_obj2txt. If applications echo pretty printing output, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read information from the stack.Refer to OpenSSL Security Advisory [6 Aug 2014] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3512.title: OpenSSL SRP parameters denial of service
CVE-2014-3512.body: OpenSSL is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an internal buffer overrun. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using invalid SRP parameters sent from a malicious server or client to cause a denial of service.Refer to OpenSSL Security Advisory [6 Aug 2014] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3530.title: Red Hat JBoss XML information disclosure
CVE-2014-3530.body: Red Hat JBoss Enterprise Web Platform could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an XML External Entity Injection (XXE) error when processing XML data by the org.picketlink.common.util.DocumentUtil.getDocumentBuilderFactory() method. By sending specially-crafted XML data, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3534.title: Linux Kernel ptrace.c privilege escalation
CVE-2014-3534.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the __poke_user() and __poke_user_compat() functions within ptrace.c. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain read and write access to kernel memory.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3554.title: libndp ndp_msg_opt_dnssl_domain() buffer overflow
CVE-2014-3554.body: libndp is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the ndp_msg_opt_dnssl_domain() function when handling the DNS Search List (DNSSL). By using man-in-the-middle techniques, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3559.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager oVirt storage back end information disclosure
CVE-2014-3559.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly erase memory snapshots when deleting VMs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the contents of memory snapshots on an uninitialized storage volume.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3560.title: Samba nmbd buffer overflow
CVE-2014-3560.body: Samba is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the nmbd NetBIOS name services daemon. By sending a specially-crafted request, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system with root privileges.Upgrade to the latest version of Samba (4.1.11 and 4.0.21 or later), available from the Samba Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-3561.title: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Log Collector information disclosure
CVE-2014-3561.body: Red Hat Enterprise Virtualization Manager Log Collector could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the rhevm-log-collector utility supplying the PostgreSQL database password as a command line parameter when running the sosreport utility. By monitoring a process listing, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to read the password and obtain sensitive information.Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3568.title: OpenSSL no-sslv3 security bypass
CVE-2014-3568.body: OpenSSL could allow a remote attacker bypass security restrictions. When configured with "no-ssl3" as a build option, servers could accept and complete a SSL 3.0 handshake. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions.Refer to OpenSSL Security Advisory [15 Oct 2014] for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3575.title: Apache OpenOffice.org OLE information disclosure
CVE-2014-3575.body: Apache OpenOffice.org (OOo) could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the generation of OLE object previews when handling a specially crafted document. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Upgrade to the latest version of OpenOffice.org (4.1.1 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-3581.title: Apache HTTP Server mod_cache denial of service
CVE-2014-3581.body: Apache HTTP Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference in the mod_cache module. By sending a specially-crafted Content-Type header value, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the server to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Apache SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3594.title: OpenStack Dashboard Horizon Host Aggregates interface cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3594.body: OpenStack Dashboard (Horizon) is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Host Aggregates interface. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to OSSA 2014-027 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3601.title: Linux Kernel kvm_iommu_map_pages denial of service
CVE-2014-3601.body: Linux Kernel is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the miscalculation of the number of pages during the handling of a mapping failure by the kvm_iommu_map_pages function. By triggering a large gfn value, a remote attacker from within the local network could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt the OS memory and cause a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3604.title: Not-Yet-Commons-SSL certificate security bypass
CVE-2014-3604.body: Not-Yet-Commons-SSL could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to verify that the server hostname matches a domain name in the subject's Common Name (CN) field of the SSL certificates. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to impersonate trusted servers.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Julius Davies SVN Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3618.title: procmail addresses buffer overflow
CVE-2014-3618.body: procmail is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing addresses with unbalanced quotes. By sending an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Procmail Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3623.title: Apache CXF SAML security bypass
CVE-2014-3623.body: Apache CXF could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly enforce the security semantics of SAML SubjectConfirmation methods when used with the TransportBinding. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to possibly conduct spoofing attacks.Upgrade to the latest version of Apache CXF (2.6.11, 2.7.8 or 3.0.0 or later), available from the Apache Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-3675.title: Shim OOB denial of service
CVE-2014-3675.body: Shim is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when parsing DHCPv6 packets. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3676.title: Shim UEFI firmware buffer overflow
CVE-2014-3676.body: Shim is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking when parsing IPv6 addresses. A remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-3681.body: Jenkins CI is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied inputt. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Jenkins Security Advisory 2014-10-01 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3712.title: Katello to_sym denial of service
CVE-2014-3712.body: Katello is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an error when user parameters are passed to to_sym. A remote authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Katello GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-3779.title: AdSelfservice Plus cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-3779.body: AdSelfservice Plus is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the name parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of January 3, 2015.

CVE-2014-3796.title: VMware vCloud Networking and Security information disclosure
CVE-2014-3796.body: An unspecified error in VMware vCloud Networking and Security (vCNS) could allow a remote attacker to obtain critical information.Refer to VMware Security Advisory VMSA-2014-0009 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-3867.title: IBM Sametime Enterprise Meeting Server information disclosure
CVE-2014-3867.body: Cookies are used to transport contents usually used to identify session state or other settings in web applications, therefore should be appropriately secured. Cookies used in secure connections should not be able to be transferred over unencrypted channel and not be readable by client side scripting languages in browsers if not needed.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-3952.title: FreeBSD control messages information disclosure
CVE-2014-3952.body: FreeBSD could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly initialize the buffer between control message headers and data. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain portions of kernel memory.Refer to FreeBSD-SA-14:17.kmem for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4024.title: Multiple F5 Networks information disclosure
CVE-2014-4024.body: Multiple F5 Networks could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper handling of SSL records by a third-party component shipped with the BIG-IP system.Refer to F5 Security Advisory sol15500 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4043.title: GNU C Library posix_spawn_file_actions_addopen code execution
CVE-2014-4043.body: GNU C Library could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a use-after-free error in posix_spawn_file_actions_addopen. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the GNU C Library GIT Repository. See References.

CVE-2014-4050.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2014-4050.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-051. See References.

CVE-2014-4051.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2014-4051.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-051. See References.

CVE-2014-4052.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2014-4052.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-051. See References.

CVE-2014-4055.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer code execution
CVE-2014-4055.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in Microsoft Security Bulletin MS14-051. See References.

CVE-2014-4068.title: Microsoft Lync Server denial of service
CVE-2014-4068.body: Microsoft Lync Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by improper handling of exceptions. By executing a specially crafted call, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to stop responding.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-4070.title: Microsoft Lync Server reflected XSS information disclosure
CVE-2014-4070.body: Microsoft Lync Server could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by improper handling of specially crafted content. By persuading a victim to click a specially-crafted URL, a remote attacker could execute scripts in the victim's browser to obtain information from web sessions.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-4074.title: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler privilege escalation
CVE-2014-4074.body: Microsoft Windows Task Scheduler could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper integrity checks on tasks. By executing a specially crafted application, a local authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code and gain complete control over the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.
