CVE-2014-4148.title: Microsoft TrueType font code execution
CVE-2014-4148.body: Microsoft Windows kernel-mode driver (win32k.sys) could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper handling of TrueType fonts. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file or URL, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to take complete control of the system.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-4170.title: Free Reprintables ArticleFR data.php security bypass
CVE-2014-4170.body: Free Reprintables ArticleFR could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improper access restrictions when accessing the data.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP GET request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify or delete information stored in database and gain access to the application.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-4200.title: VMware Support Tool /tmp directory information disclosure
CVE-2014-4200.body: VMware Support Tool could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by insecure permissions being set for the /tmp directory. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-4312.title: Epicor Enterprise cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4312.body: Epicor Enterprise is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Apply the patch for this vulnerability (FS74SP6_HotfixTL054181), available from the Epicor Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4313.title: Epicor Procurement SQL injection
CVE-2014-4313.body: Epicor Procurement is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Upgrade to the latest version of Epicor Procurement (7.4 SP2 or later), available from the Epicor Software Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4329.title: ntopng host cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4329.body: ntopng is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the host_details.lua script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the host parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to ntop Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4330.title: Perl Dumper denial of service
CVE-2014-4330.body: Perl is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a stack-based buffer overflow when serializing data using the Data::Dumper extension. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the Dumper method on a large Array-Reference to exhaust all available stack memory.Refer to CPAN Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4341.title: MIT Kerberos GSSAPI denial of service
CVE-2014-4341.body: MIT Kerberos is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference. By injecting invalid tokens into a GSSAPI application session, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Kerberos GIT Repository. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4342.title: MIT Kerberos GSSAPI denial of service
CVE-2014-4342.body: MIT Kerberos is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference. By injecting invalid tokens into a GSSAPI application session, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Kerberos GIT Repository. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4344.title: MIT Kerberos 5 SPNEGO acceptor denial of service
CVE-2014-4344.body: MIT Kerberos 5 (krb5) is vulnerable to a NULL pointer dereference in the acc_ctx_cont() function within the SPNEGO Acceptor for Continuation Tokens. By sending a specially-crafted request, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the application to crash.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Kerberos GIT Repository. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4345.title: MIT Kerberos 5 krb5_encode_krbsecretkey() buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4345.body: MIT Kerberos 5 is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the krb5_encode_krbsecretkey() function. By sending an overly long array, a remote authenticated attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to MIT krb5 Security Advisory MITKRB5-SA-2014-001 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4346.title: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4346.body: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller and Citrix NetScaler Gateway are vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to CTX140863 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4347.title: Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller information disclosure
CVE-2014-4347.body: An unspecified error in Citrix NetScaler Application Delivery Controller and Citrix NetScaler Gateway could allow a remote attacker to obtain cookie information.Refer to CTX140863 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4350.title: Apple Mac OS X MIDI file buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4350.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by when handling malicious files. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted MIDI file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4351.title: Apple Mac OS X QuickTime m4a buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4351.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by when handling audio samples by the Quicktime component. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted m4a file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4352.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV information disclosure
CVE-2014-4352.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the address book being encrypted with a key protected only by the hardware UID. By obtaining the UID, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4354.title: Apple iOS Bluetooth security bypass
CVE-2014-4354.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when Bluetooth is unexpectedly enabled by default after upgrading iOS. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a Bluetooth session to perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4356.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV information disclosure
CVE-2014-4356.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to follow the intended configuration setting for text-message preview on the lock screen. By reading the lock screen, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4357.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV information disclosure
CVE-2014-4357.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the Accounts Framework. By reading log data, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4361.title: Apple iOS private API security bypass
CVE-2014-4361.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to properly restrict the private API for app prominence by the Home & Lock Screen subsystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious background app to determine the frontmost app.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4362.title: Apple iOS Sandbox Profiles information disclosure
CVE-2014-4362.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly restrict the third-party app sandbox profile by the Sandbox Profiles implementation. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted application to obtain sensitive Apple ID information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4364.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV 802.1X spoofing
CVE-2014-4364.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error in the 802.1X subsystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the LEAP authentication process to spoof a WiFi access point.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4367.title: Apple iOS Voice Dial security bypass
CVE-2014-4367.body: Apple iOS could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error when Voice Dial is unexpectedly enabled by default after upgrading iOS. By speaking a telephone number, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4368.title: Apple iOS Accessibility subsystem security bypass
CVE-2014-4368.body: Apple iOS could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Accessibility subsystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using attack vectors related to AssistiveTouch events to interfere with screen locking.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4377.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV integer overflow
CVE-2014-4377.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer underflow in CoreGraphics. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted PDF document, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4379.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IOHIDFamily security bypass
CVE-2014-4379.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an out-of-bounds read error when handling an unspecified IOHIDFamily function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass kernel address space layout randomization and read kernel pointers.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4380.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IOHIDFamily code execution
CVE-2014-4380.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improper bounds checking on write operations by the IOHIDFamily kernel extension. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious application to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4381.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV code execution
CVE-2014-4381.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out-of-bounds write error in Libnotify. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4383.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV spoofing
CVE-2014-4383.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to conduct spoofing attacks, caused by an error in the Assets subsystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to spoof Last-Modified response headers.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4388.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IODataQueue code execution
CVE-2014-4388.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to properly validate IODataQueue objects within IOKit. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious application to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4389.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IOKit integer overflow
CVE-2014-4389.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer overflow in IOKit. By using a malicious application, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4390.title: Apple Mac OS X Bluetooth API code execution
CVE-2014-4390.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error when handling Bluetooth API call. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4391.title: Apple Mac OS X resource rules security bypass
CVE-2014-4391.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the launch of an invalid signature by an application signed on OS X prior to 10.9 or using custom resource rules. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions on the system.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4393.title: Apple Mac OS X GLSL buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4393.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the shader compiler. A remote attacker could compile untrusted GLSL shaders to overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4394.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4394.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4395.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4395.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4396.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4396.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4397.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4398.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4399.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4399.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4400.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4400.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4401.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4401.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4402.title: Apple Mac OS X IOAcceleratorFamily function code execution
CVE-2014-4402.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an out-of-bounds read error when handling the IOAcceleratorFamily function. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4403.title: Apple Mac OS X CPU Global Descriptor Table security bypass
CVE-2014-4403.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the allocation of the CPU Global Descriptor Table at a predictable address. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass kernel address space layout randomization.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4404.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IOHIDFamily buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4404.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV are vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by IOHIDFamily. By using a specially-crafted application, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4406.title: Apple Mac OS X Xcode Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4406.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the Xcode Server. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4407.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV information disclosure
CVE-2014-4407.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to properly initialize kernel memory by the IOKit functions. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious application to read uninitialized data.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4410.title: Apple iOS WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4410.body: A memory corruption vulnerability in Apple iOS WebKit could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash using a specially-crafted Web site.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4411.title: Apple iOS WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4411.body: A memory corruption vulnerability in Apple iOS WebKit could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash using a specially-crafted Web site.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4412.title: Apple iOS WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4412.body: A memory corruption vulnerability in Apple iOS WebKit could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash using a specially-crafted Web site.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4414.title: Apple iOS WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4414.body: A memory corruption vulnerability in Apple iOS WebKit could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash using a specially-crafted Web site.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4415.title: Apple iOS WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4415.body: A memory corruption vulnerability in Apple iOS WebKit could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash using a specially-crafted Web site.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4416.title: Apple Mac OS X code execution
CVE-2014-4416.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an error in some integrated graphics driver routines. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4417.title: Apple Mac OS X SafariNotificationAgent denial of service
CVE-2014-4417.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an exception error when handling Safari Push Notifications by SafariNotificationAgent. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause future Safari Push Notifications to be missed.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4418.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV IODataQueue objects code execution
CVE-2014-4418.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the failure to properly validate IODataQueue objects within IOKit. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a malicious application to execute arbitrary code with system privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4422.title: Apple iOS and Apple TV security bypass
CVE-2014-4422.body: Apple iOS and Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the use of a predictable random number generator during the early portion of the boot process. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass hardening measures and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4423.title: Apple iOS Accounts subsystem security bypass
CVE-2014-4423.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the Accounts subsystem. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted application to bypass the sandbox protection mechanism and obtain an active iCloud account's Apple ID.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4424.title: Apple Mac OS X Wiki Server SQL injection
CVE-2014-4424.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the Wiki Server, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4425.title: Apple Mac OS X require password security bypass
CVE-2014-4425.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to enforce the 'require password after sleep or screen saver begins' preference until after a reboot. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4426.title: Apple Mac OS X AFP file information disclosure
CVE-2014-4426.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the AFP file server supporting a command that returned all the network addresses of the system. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to determine the system network addresses.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4427.title: Apple Mac OS X accessibility API security bypass
CVE-2014-4427.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the accessibility API. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass sandbox restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4428.title: Apple Mac OS X Bluetooth security bypass
CVE-2014-4428.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to restrict unencrypted connections from Human Interface Device-class Bluetooth Low Energy devices. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass pariring and spoof the legitimate device to establish a connection.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4430.title: Apple Mac OS X CoreStorage security bypass
CVE-2014-4430.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by encrypted volume remaining unlocked when ejected in CoreStorage. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass security restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4431.title: Apple Mac OS X Dock screen lock security bypass
CVE-2014-4431.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a state management issue when handling the screen lock with Dock. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view windows when the screen is locked.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4433.title: Apple Mac OS X HFS resource folks buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4433.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by when handling HFS resource forks. By persuading a victim to open a specially-crafted file, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4434.title: Apple Mac OS X HFS filenames denial of service
CVE-2014-4434.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by a NULL pointer dereference when handling HFS filenames. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to shutdown.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4435.title: Apple Mac OS X iCloud information disclosure
CVE-2014-4435.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to prevent a brute force attack on iCloud Lost mode PIN. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using brute force techniques to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4436.title: Apple Mac OS X IOHIDFamily denial of service
CVE-2014-4436.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by an out-of-bounds read in the IOHIDFamily driver. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4437.title: Apple Mac OS X LaunchServices security bypass
CVE-2014-4437.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the LaunchServices interface. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass sandbox restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4439.title: Apple Mac OS X Mail information disclosure
CVE-2014-4439.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by user interface inconsistency in Mail application that sends emails to addresses removed from the contact list. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4440.title: Apple Mac OS X MCX Desktop security bypass
CVE-2014-4440.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to remove settings when MCX Desktop mobile configuration profiles were uninstalled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4441.title: Apple Mac OS X File Sharing framework information disclosure
CVE-2014-4441.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by a state management error within the File Sharing framework. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause File Sharing may enter a state from which it cannot be disabled and obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4442.title: Apple Mac OS X system control sockets denial of service
CVE-2014-4442.body: Apple Mac OS X is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending specially-crafted messages to system control sockets, a local attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4446.title: Apple OS X Server Mail denial of service
CVE-2014-4446.body: Apple OS X Server is vulnerable to a denial of service, caused by the failure to respect modifications to the group service access control list (SACL) settings for Mail until after the Mail service has restarted. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause a denial of service.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4447.title: Apple OS X Server Profile Manager information disclosure
CVE-2014-4447.body: Apple OS X Server could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error when setting up or editing profiles in Profile Manager. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain passwords logged to a file and other sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4448.title: Apple iOS Documents directory weak security
CVE-2014-4448.body: Apple iOS could provide weaker than expected security, caused by transferred files being written with insufficient cryptographic protection and encrypted with a key protected only by the hardware UID. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to view encrypted data and obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4449.title: Apple iOS TLS certficate information disclosure
CVE-2014-4449.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper verification of TLS certificates in iCloud data access clients. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4451.title: Apple iOS passcode attempt limit security bypass
CVE-2014-4451.body: Apple iOS could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the failure to enforce the failed passcode attempt limit. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass screen lock and gain access to the device.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4452.title: Apple TV WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4452.body: Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the WebKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4453.title: Apple Mac OS X AFP file information disclosure
CVE-2014-4453.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error within the initial connection between Spotlight or Safari and the Spotlight Suggestions servers. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain the user's approximate location.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4455.title: Apple TV Mach-O executable files code execution
CVE-2014-4455.body: Apple TV could allow a local attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a state management issue existed when handling Mach-O executable files with overlapping segments. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute unsigned code on the system.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4457.title: Apple iOS debugging functionality security bypass
CVE-2014-4457.body: Apple iOS could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a sandbox permissions error within the debugging functionality. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass sandbox restrictions and perform unauthorized actions.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4458.title: Apple Mac OS X About This Mac information disclosure
CVE-2014-4458.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by sending of unnecessary cookies when the "About This Mac" menu item is selected. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4460.title: Apple Mac OS X web cache information disclosure
CVE-2014-4460.body: Apple Mac OS X could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to clear the web cache after the user leaves private browsing. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain browsing data.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4461.title: Apple TV IOSharedDataQueue objects code execution
CVE-2014-4461.body: Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a validation issue when handling specific metadata fields of IOSharedDataQueue objects. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with elevated privileges.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4462.title: Apple TV WebKit code execution
CVE-2014-4462.body: Apple TV could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by a memory corruption error in the WebKit component. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4463.title: Apple iOS Photo Library security bypass
CVE-2014-4463.body: Apple iOS could allow a local attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the he Leave a Message option in FaceTime. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to photos in the Photo Library.Refer to Apple Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4589.title: Silverlight Media Player plugin for WordPress uploader.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4589.body: Silverlight Media Player plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the uploader.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the post_id parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-4618.title: EMC Documentum Content Server user-created system objects code execution
CVE-2014-4618.body: EMC Documentum Content Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by the improper checks being performed on user-created system objects. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system with superuser privileges.Refer to ESA-2014-079 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4619.title: EMC RSA Identity Management and Governance security bypass
CVE-2014-4619.body: EMC RSA Identity Management and Governance could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. The systems configured with NovellIM fail to require a password to authenticate valid users. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanism and gain unauthorized access to the system.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-081 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4620.title: EMC Networker MEDITECH information disclosure
CVE-2014-4620.body: EMC NetWorker could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by an error in the Module for MEDITECH when used with EMC RecoverPoint. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-087 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4621.title: EMC Documentum Content Server privilege escalation
CVE-2014-4621.body: EMC Documentum Content Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper authorization checks on protected Documentum system types subtypes. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to restricted data and perform unauthorized actions on the system.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-091 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4622.title: EMC Documentum Content Server privilege escalation
CVE-2014-4622.body: EMC Documentum Content Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by improper authorization checks on subgroups within the dm_superusers group. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to restricted data and perform unauthorized actions on the system.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-091 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4623.title: EMC Avamar Data Store information disclosure
CVE-2014-4623.body: EMC Avamar Data Store (ADS) and Avamar Virtual Edition (AVE) could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the storing of passwords using a weak cryptographic scheme. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-094 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4624.title: VMware vSphere Data Protection information disclosure
CVE-2014-4624.body: VMware vSphere Data Protection could allow a remote attacker to obtain sensitive information. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using Java API calls to obtain sensitive account credentials. Note: This vulnerability also affects EMC Avamar.Refer to VMware Security Advisory VMSA-2014-0011 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-4627.title: EMC RSA Web Threat Detection SQL injection
CVE-2014-4627.body: EMC RSA Web Threat Detection is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements using an unspecified parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-135 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4629.title: EMC Documentum Content Server Insecure Direct Object Reference privilege escalation
CVE-2014-4629.body: EMC Documentum Content Server could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by the Insecure Direct Object Reference vulnerability. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain read access to restricted data and delete arbitrary files stored on the Content Server machine.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-156 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4631.title: RSA Adaptive Authentication security bypass
CVE-2014-4631.body: RSA Adaptive Authentication could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. By sending a device binding request within Challenge SOAP call, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication process and gain unauthorized access to the application.Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2014-160 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4632.title: VMware vSphere Data Protection and the proxy client in EMC Avamar Data Store SSL security bypass
CVE-2014-4632.body: VMware vSphere Data Protection (VDP) and the proxy client in EMC Avamar Data Store (ADS) and Avamar Virtual Edition could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of SSL certificates. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to bypass intended backup and restore access restrictions.For VMware: Refer to VMSA-2015-0002 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For EMC: Refer to EMC Security Advisory ESA-2015-006 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4647.title: Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect.ActiveX control buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4647.body: Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect and Tom Sawyer Visualization.ActiveX control is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web page that passes an overly long string argument to the insecure loadExtensionFactory() method, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.For Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect: Upgrade to the latest version of Embarcadero ER/Studio Data Architect (9.7.1 or later), available from the Embarcadero Web site. See References. For Tom Sawyer Visualization ActiveX: Upgrade to the latest version of Tom Sawyer Visualization ActiveX (8.0.0.1067 or later), available from the Embarcadero Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4700.title: Citrix XenDesktop desktop groups unauthorized access
CVE-2014-4700.body: Citrix XenDesktop could allow a remote authenticated attacker to gain access to the system, caused by an error when using pooled random desktop groups where the broker configuration setting ShutdownDesktopsAfterUse is disabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to another user’s desktop.Refer to CTX139591 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4727.title: TP-LINK WDR4300 cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4727.body: TP-LINK WDR4300 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the DHCP hostname field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest firmware version of TP-LINK WDR4300 (v1_140916 or later), available from the TP-Link Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4728.title: TP-LINK WDR4300 denial of service
CVE-2014-4728.body: TP-LINK WDR4300 is vulnerable to a denial of service. By sending a special-crafted GET request containing an extra header with an improper value, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to cause the system to stop responding.Upgrade to the latest firmware version of TP-LINK WDR4300 (v1_140916 or later), available from the TP-Link Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4735.title: MyWebSQL index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4735.body: MyWebSQL is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the table parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-4737.title: Textpattern index.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4737.body: Textpattern is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the index.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Textpattern (4.5.7 or later), available from the Textpattern Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4738.title: Fortinet Fortiweb unspecified cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4738.body: Fortinet Fortiweb is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to Fortinet Security Advisory FG-IR-14-012 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4746.title: IBM WebSphere Portal information disclosure
CVE-2014-4746.body: IBM WebSphere Portal uses different error codes that would allow a remote attacker to identify existing systems behind the firewall.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4748.title: IBM Sametime Classic Meeting Server cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4748.body: IBM Sametime Classic Meeting Server is vulnerable to reflected cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using a specially crafted URL to execute a script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4749.title: IBM PowerVC SSH Communication vulnerable to MITM attacks
CVE-2014-4749.body: Some places in PowerVC are not checking the SSH server's key against PowerVC's known_hosts file to ensure that PowerVC is talking to the correct endpoint. This opens the door to a possible MITM (man-in-the-middle) attack.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

Users might invoke the service with a query that returns all documents including associated document properties.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-4844.body: IBM Business Process Manager allow importing and exporting process applications and toolkits. While this functionality is only available to authorized users in the user interface, the actual server side code accepts requests from lower privileged users.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4910.title: X.Org xf86-video-intel video driver tools/backlight_helper.c directory traversal
CVE-2014-4910.body: X.Org xf86-video-intel video driver could allow a local attacker to traverse directories on the system. An attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to tools/backlight_helper.c containing "dot dot" sequences (/../) to create or overwrite arbitrary files on the system.Refer to X.Org Mailing List, Fri Jul 4 12:34:28 PDT 2014 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4925.title: Good for Enterprise for Android open redirect
CVE-2014-4925.body: Good for Enterprise for Android could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks. By sending a specially-crafted email, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to redirect a victim to arbitrary Web sites.No remedy available as of January 9, 2015.

CVE-2014-4943.title: Linux Kernel PPP privilege escalation
CVE-2014-4943.body: Linux Kernel could allow a local attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an error in the pppol2tp_setsockopt() and pppol2tp_getsockopt() functions when CONFIG_PPPOL2TP is enabled. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain root privileges on the system.Apply the patch for this vulnerability, available from the Linux Kernel GIT Repository. See References. For IBM products: Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-4947.title: Citrix XenServer HVM graphics console buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4947.body: Citrix XenServer is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the HVM graphics console. By sending an overly long argument, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to CTX140984 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4965.title: Shopizer productlist.action and searchcriteria.action cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-4965.body: Shopizer is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the productlist.action and searchcriteria.action scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using various parameter in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Shopizer (2.0 or later), available from the Shopizer Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4974.title: Multiple ESET products Firewall NDIS filter information disclosure
CVE-2014-4974.body: Multiple ESET products could allow a local attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the improper validation of IOCTLs by the Firewall NDIS filter (EpFwNdis.sys) kernel mode driver. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to obtain sensitive information.Refer to ESET Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-4975.title: Ruby encodes() function buffer overflow
CVE-2014-4975.body: Ruby is vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking by the encodes() function in pack.c. By sending an overly long string, a remote attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Apply the appropriate updates for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-4976.title: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer /cgi-bin/admin.cgi security bypass
CVE-2014-4976.body: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the /cgi-bin/admin.cgi script. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the selectedUserGroup parameter to modify the admin password.No remedy available as of July 17, 2014.

CVE-2014-4977.title: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer exporters.php SQL injection
CVE-2014-4977.body: Dell SonicWALL Scrutinizer is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the exporters.php script using the changeUnit, methodDetail, and xcNetworkDetail functions, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of July 17, 2014.

CVE-2014-4981.title: LPAR2RRD unspecified command execution
CVE-2014-4981.body: LPAR2RRD could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the system, caused by the improper validation of input. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary commands on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of LPAR2RRD (3.5 or later), available from the LPAR2RRD Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-4984.title: Deja Vu Crescendo - Sales CRM login.aspx SQL injection
CVE-2014-4984.body: Déjà Vu Crescendo - Sales CRM is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the login.aspx script using multiple parameters, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.

CVE-2014-0046.title: Ember.js link-to cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-0046.body: Ember.js is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the title attribute of a link-to helper to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Upgrade to the latest version of Ember.js (1.2.2 or 1.3.2 or later), available from the Ember Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-0273.title: Microsoft Internet Explorer memory corruption code execution
CVE-2014-0273.body: Microsoft Internet Explorer could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by improperly accessing an object in memory. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to corrupt memory and execute arbitrary code on the system with the privileges of the victim.Apply the appropriate patch for your system, as listed in the latest Microsoft Security Bulletin. See References. — OR — Use Microsoft Automatic Update if it is supported by your operating system. The original bulletin issued by Microsoft has been superseded.

CVE-2014-0497.title: Adobe Flash Player underflow code execution
CVE-2014-0497.body: Adobe Flash Player could allow a remote attacker to execute arbitrary code on the system, caused by an integer underflow error. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code on the system or cause the application to crash.Refer to APSB14-04 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system. See References.

CVE-2014-2588.title: McAfee Asset Manager downloadReport directory traversal

CVE-2014-6130.title: IBM Notes Traveler for Android client explicit warning against use of HTTP
CVE-2014-6130.body: The IBM Notes Traveler client for Android devices allows the end user to connect to their Traveler server over HTTPS (using SSL) or the open HTTP standard. The Notes Traveler administrator can choose to run the application over HTTP or HTTPS. IBM recommends that all data travels exclusively across HTTPS. At present, the client application does not explicitly warn the end user if the Traveler administrator has chosen the insecure HTTP variant as the transport medium. Any application that makes an HTTP connection which is not used in conjunction with a secure VPN, can potentially be subject to eavesdropping attacks if the attacker is listening on an adjacent network.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References. For other distributions: Apply the appropriate update for your system.

CVE-2014-8918.title: IBM AppScan Standard security bypass
CVE-2014-8918.body: IBM AppScan Standard could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of SSL certificates. By persuading a victim to visit a Web site containing a specially-crafted certificate, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using man-in-the-middle techniques to cause the victim to impersonate trusted servers.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-8920.title: IBM iAccess Data Transfer Program buffer overflow
CVE-2014-8920.body: IBM iAccess Data Transfer Program is vulnerable to a buffer overflow, caused by improper bounds checking. A local attacker could overflow a buffer and execute arbitrary code on the system as the current user.Refer to the appropriate IBM Security Bulletin for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-8953.title: Who's Who? Script multiple cross-site request forgery
CVE-2014-8953.body: Who's Who? Script is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the ayarsave.php and other scripts. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request to add admin account. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.No remedy available as of Oct 31, 2014.

CVE-2014-8988.title: MantisBT file_api.php security bypass
CVE-2014-8988.body: MantisBT could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error in the file_api.php script. CVE-2014-8995.title: Maarch LetterBox index.php security bypass
CVE-2014-8995.body: Maarch LetterBox could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions. By sending specially-crafted SQL statements to the index.php script using the page parameter, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass the authentication process to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of November 2014.

CVE-2014-8997.body: Digi Online Examination System could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the Photo section. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to inject and execute arbitrary PHP code on the system.Upgrade to the latest version of X7 Chat (3.0.0 a1 or later), available from the X7 Chat Web site. CVE-2014-9453.body: Simple Visitor Stat plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the simple-visitor-stat.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the User agent and other fields to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of December 12, 2014.

CVE-2014-9454.title: Simple Sticky Footer plugin for WordPress multiple cross-site request forgery
CVE-2014-9454.body: Simple Sticky Footer plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the simple-simple-sticky-footer page. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the simple_sf_width and other fields to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Upgrade to the latest version of Simple Sticky Footer plugin for WordPress (1.3.3 or later), available from the WordPress Plugin Directory. CVE-2014-9466.title: Open-Xchange Server and OX App Suite information disclosure
CVE-2014-9466.body: Open-Xchange Server and OX App Suite could allow a remote authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information, caused by the failure to restrict access to the shared directory. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to restricted files.Upgrade to the latest version of Open-Xchange OX App Suite (7.4.2-rev42, 7.6.0-rev36 and 7.6.1-rev14 or later), available from the Open-Xchange Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-9483.title: GNU Emacs security bypass
CVE-2014-9483.body: GNU Emacs could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by an error related to left-clicking. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify the PRIMARY selection.No remedy available as of January 2015.

CVE-2014-9494.title: RabbitMQ X-Forwarded-For security bypass
CVE-2014-9494.body: RabbitMQ could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper handling of malicious headers when determining the remote address. By sending a specially-crafted X-Forwarded-For header, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to connect to the broker as if they were a localhost user.Upgrade to the latest version of RabbitMQ (3.4.0 or later), available from the RabbitMQ Web site. See References.

An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to SA-CONTRIB-2014-121 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-9502.body: Open Atrium module for Drupal is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by multiple sub modules. By persuading an authenticated user to visit a malicious Web site, a remote attacker could send a malformed HTTP request. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform cross-site scripting attacks, Web cache poisoning, and other malicious activities.Refer to DRUPAL-SA-CONTRIB-2014-126 for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. CVE-2014-9503.title: Open Atrium module for Drupal security bypass
CVE-2014-9503.body: Open Atrium module for Drupal could allow a remote authenticated attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by multiple errors in the callback function. CVE-2014-9525.body: Timed Popup plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the wp-popup.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the value field to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of December 12, 2014.

CVE-2014-9526.title: Concrete5 multiple cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-9526.body: Concrete5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the bulkupdate.php and the sitemap_drag_request.php scripts. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the gName and instance_id parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of December 9, 2014.

CVE-2014-9528.title: Humhub ListController.php SQL injection
CVE-2014-9528.body: Humhub is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the ListController.php script using the from parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.No remedy available as of December 8, 2014.

CVE-2014-9567.title: ProjectSend process-upload.php file upload
CVE-2014-9567.body: ProjectSend could allow a remote attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions by the process-upload.php script. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious PHP script, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code on the vulnerable system.No remedy available as of December 29, 2014.

CVE-2014-9571.title: MantisBT install.php cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-9571.body: MantisBT is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input by the install.php script. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the admin_username and admin_password parameters in a specially-crafted URL to execute script in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the URL is clicked. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.Refer to MantisBT Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-9573.title: MantisBT manage_user_page.php SQL injection
CVE-2014-9573.body: MantisBT is vulnerable to SQL injection. A remote attacker could send specially-crafted SQL statements to the manage_user_page.php script using the MANTIS_MANAGE_USERS_COOKIE parameter, which could allow the attacker to view, add, modify or delete information in the back-end database.Refer to MantisBT Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-9574.title: FluxBB tmp/install.php local file include
CVE-2014-9574.body: FluxBB could allow a remote attacker to include arbitrary files. A remote attacker could send a specially-crafted URL request to the tmp/install.php script using the install_lang parameter to specify a malicious file from the local system, which could allow the attacker to obtain sensitive information or execute arbitrary code on the vulnerable Web server. Note: In order to exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary code using a local file, the attacker would first be required to upload a malicious file or inject arbitrary commands into an existing file.Upgrade to the latest version of FluxBB (1.5.8 or later), available from the FluxBB Web site. See References.

CVE-2014-9580.title: ProjectSend image description cross-site scripting
CVE-2014-9580.body: ProjectSend is vulnerable to cross-site scripting, caused by improper validation of user-supplied input. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using the image description to inject malicious script into a Web page which would be executed in a victim's Web browser within the security context of the hosting Web site, once the page is viewed. An attacker could use this vulnerability to steal the victim's cookie-based authentication credentials.No remedy available as of December 20, 2014.

CVE-2014-9624.title: MantisBT CAPTCHA security bypass
CVE-2014-9624.body: MantisBT could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by a weakness in the CAPTCHA authentication mechanism. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability using automated attack vectors to bypass CAPTCHA protection mechanisms.Refer to MantisBT Web site for patch, upgrade or suggested workaround information. See References.

CVE-2014-5246.title: Tenda A5s router security bypass
CVE-2014-5246.body: Tenda A5s router could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by improperly trusting cookies. By setting the admin cookie, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to bypass authentication mechanisms.No remedy available as of October 1, 2014.
